00029 #ifndef __OverlayContainer_H__
00030 #define __OverlayContainer_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreOverlayElement.h"
00034 #include "OgreIteratorWrappers.h"
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace Ogre {
00038 
00039 
00056     class _OgreExport OverlayContainer : public OverlayElement
00057     {
00058     public:
00059         typedef map<String, OverlayElement*>::type ChildMap;
00060         typedef MapIterator<ChildMap> ChildIterator;
00061         typedef map<String, OverlayContainer*>::type ChildContainerMap;
00062         typedef MapIterator<ChildContainerMap> ChildContainerIterator;
00063     protected:
00064         // Map of all children
00065         ChildMap mChildren;
00066         // Map of container children (subset of mChildren)
00067         ChildContainerMap mChildContainers;
00068 
00069         bool mChildrenProcessEvents;
00070  
00071     public:
00073         OverlayContainer(const String& name);
00074         virtual ~OverlayContainer();
00075 
00077         virtual void addChild(OverlayElement* elem);
00079         virtual void addChildImpl(OverlayElement* elem);
00081         virtual void addChildImpl(OverlayContainer* cont);
00083         virtual void removeChild(const String& name);
00085         virtual OverlayElement* getChild(const String& name);
00086 
00088         void initialise(void);
00089 
00090         void _addChild(OverlayElement* elem);
00091         void _removeChild(OverlayElement* elem) { _removeChild(elem->getName()); }
00092         void _removeChild(const String& name);
00093 
00095         virtual ChildIterator getChildIterator(void);
00096 
00101         virtual ChildContainerIterator getChildContainerIterator(void);
00102 
00104         virtual void _positionsOutOfDate(void);
00105 
00107         virtual void _update(void);
00108 
00110         virtual ushort _notifyZOrder(ushort newZOrder);
00111 
00113         virtual void _notifyViewport();
00114 
00116         virtual void _notifyWorldTransforms(const Matrix4& xform);
00117 
00119         virtual void _notifyParent(OverlayContainer* parent, Overlay* overlay);
00120 
00122         virtual void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue);
00123 
00125         inline bool isContainer() const
00126         { return true; }
00127 
00129         virtual inline bool isChildrenProcessEvents() const
00130         { return true; }
00131 
00133         virtual inline void setChildrenProcessEvents(bool val)
00134         { mChildrenProcessEvents = val; }
00135 
00137         virtual OverlayElement* findElementAt(Real x, Real y);      // relative to parent
00138 
00139         void copyFromTemplate(OverlayElement* templateOverlay);
00140         virtual OverlayElement* clone(const String& instanceName);
00141 
00142     };
00143 
00144 
00148 }
